short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of the night sky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Captures a captivating scene where a lone silhouette stands against a vast landscape under the shimmering Milky Way. Shooting stars streak across the sky, while the horizon glows softly with twilight hues, creating a magical blend of starlit blues and sunset pinks. Perfect for stargazers and dreamers, this theme adds a touch of cosmic calm to every new tab.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
